repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:latest

# Create app directory
RUN mkdir -p /usr/src/app && rm -rf /usr/src/app
WORKDIR /usr/src/app

COPY package.json /usr/src/app/

RUN npm install && npm cache clean --force;

ADD src /usr/src/app/src
ADD public /usr/src/app/public

RUN npm build

CMD [ "npm", "start" ]
